Label: EXT_FirstRescue_KNP01
String:
Thank you, but serving in the
Rescue Squad is more than just
wearing a cool uniform.  Our mission is to right the wrongs
of this world. To stamp out
injustice wherever it festers!  If you ever want to talk to our
chief director, you can find him
at Rescue Squad HQ in Port
Prisma's yellow district.
Translation:
Thank you, but serving in the
Rescue Squad is more than just
wearing a cool uniform.  Our mission is to right the wrongs
of this world. To stamp out
injustice wherever it festers!  If you ever want to talk to our
chief director, you can find him
at Rescue Squad HQ in Port
Prisma's yellow district.

Label: Rescue_TalkFirst_00
String:
Mario, I was hoping you'd stop by!  I'm the commander-in-chief of the
Rescue Squad coalition.  But you're making my job easy!
Thanks to you, all Rescue Squad
missions are complete.  Thanks for the assist!
Translation:
Mario, I was hoping you'd stop by!  I'm the commander-in-chief of the
Rescue Squad coalition.  But you're making my job easy!
Thanks to you, all Rescue Squad
missions are complete.  Thanks for the assist!

Label: EXT_FirstRescue_Painky01
String:
You Rescue Squad guys are so cool.
I love the color-coordinated getups,
and your scarves are CHOICE!
Translation:
You Rescue Squad guys are so cool.
I love the color-coordinated getups,
and your scarves are CHOICE!

Label: Rescue_TalkFirst
String:
Mario.
I was hoping you'd stop by.  I'm the commander-in-chief of the
Rescue Squad coalition.  The Rescue Squads were formed to
help those in need across the land.  As the leader of the coalition, it's my
job to keep tabs on each squad.  Let me know if I can help you find
any of the Rescue Squad members.
Translation:
Mario.
I was hoping you'd stop by.  I'm the commander-in-chief of the
Rescue Squad coalition.  The Rescue Squads were formed to
help those in need across the land.  As the leader of the coalition, it's my
job to keep tabs on each squad.  Let me know if I can help you find
any of the Rescue Squad members.
